page.title: 18GUID NYCHBURRIS
page.content: On Saturday, 15 June, 1985 Dumfries,its people known as Doonhamers, its many friends, its large tourist population will begin the celebration of a Festival founded deep in history and celebrated since 1932. {THE COURIER:}is the pursuivants advance guard. He warns the provost so that a fitting reception may be prepared for his superior. {THE PURSUIVANT:}is the nobleman with the task of conveying the King's Charter to the provost. {THE CHARTER:}is a document conferring on the citizens of the town certain privileges. {TOWN DRUMMER:}announces to the people the coming of the pursuivant and summons them to the Midsteeple to hear the Charter proclaimed.
